short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keep your browser open in the background to receive Guardian Partner Notifications.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is specific for users of the "Guardian Partner" platform, responsible for allowing event notifications from equipment registered and configured on it, to be received even when the browser is closed.

We will not collect any data from our users, we have no interest in that, this extension is to keep notifications active even if the browser is accidentally closed. Thinking about monitoring and asset security, it is essential that this extension be installed.
